§oThe §3§oMulti Smelter§o§r§o might be the §6§omost powerful Furnace§r§o in modded Minecraft.§r

At its lowest power (Cupronickel coils and LV Voltage), it smelts 32 items in just 12 seconds - equivalent to §926.7 Furnaces§r, or 3.3 Steam Ovens!

Not to mention, standard §aoverclocks§r are in effect.
And more importantly higher tier §3Coils§r increase the amount of items it can smelt in §dparallel§r!
